_comment: Skill Seekers MCP server configuration example. Copy to .vscode/mcp.json and merge with existing config.
_instructions: 1. Install skill-seekers: uv tool install skill-seekers
2. Copy this config to your .vscode/mcp.json servers section
3. Restart VS Code to load the new MCP server
4. Output will be restricted to temp/skill_seekers/
